parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Commits control animation to last specified duration. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The animation is not guaranteed to last given duration exactly, it could be shorter it could be longer, it depends on how busy is the rest of the system </value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlCommit''' time </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]] - control to animate </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - animation duration </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlCommit]] 2; // make animation last approx. 2 seconds</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlCommitted]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlSetFade]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>:

</value></part></template>
